channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping issue persists without resolution, 25th February
item.description:
Further to ref: 8985260 on 24 Feb, 8934082 on 16 Feb, 8914360 on 13 Feb, 8880708 on 10 Feb, 8849897 on 06 Feb, 8730739, 8676867, and 8682206, the issue of constant fly tipping, with black rubbish bags and other rubbish being left out in the communal pathway, continues unresolved week after week. This latest instance occurred on 25 Feb. Attention to this matter to stop it from happening continuously multiple times a week, is urgently needed. In fact the problem is worsening week after week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lucey Way, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Persistent fly-tipping along Enfield-managed section of Commercial Road, 25th February
item.description:
The Enfield-managed section of Commercial Road is experiencing persistent fly-tipping and litter accumulation, including pallets, cardboard packaging, nitrous oxide canisters, timber, and general waste. The condition of this stretch continues to deteriorate, with rubbish remaining in place for extended periods and new waste appearing regularly. By contrast, adjacent sections of the same road and neighbouring streets under different management are routinely cleaned, with visible manual street cleansing operatives attending regularly. This difference in maintenance standards is immediately noticeable and highlights a lack of routine cleansing presence on the Enfield-managed section. There is no visible manual street sweeping activity on this part of the road, resulting in loose cardboard, pallets, and debris spreading across pavements and into the carriageway. The ongoing neglect is encouraging further dumping and anti-social behaviour. This location should be treated as a priority area requiring: • Immediate clearance of accumulated waste • Regular manual street cleansing operatives • Monitoring and enforcement to prevent continued fly-tipping Without intervention, this section of the road will continue to fall further below acceptable cleanliness standards.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Commercial Road, Edmonton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgrace amounts of rubbish and fly tipping along side of north circular road, 25th February
item.description:
Totally unacceptable levels of littering and fly tipping on side of North circular Road. This has to be cleared up otherwise it will just keep getting worse and it will feel like a Third World country.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near M&S when Driving from Kilburn Lane to Carlton Vale, 25th February
item.description:
If you’re driving from Kilburn lane towards Carlton vale, joining oncoming traffic from Salusbury Road, just as you approach M&S in front of you, there is a very large and deep pothole at an extremely dangerous part of the road, where traffic is merging in a roundabout.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
